Pizza.name: Margherita
Pizza.description: Pizza Margherita is a typical Neapolitan pizza, made with San Marzano tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, salt and extra-virgin olive oil.

Pizza.name: Mac and Cheese
Pizza.description: Take pizza night to the next level with Macaroni and Cheese Pizza.

Pizza.name: Fresh Pan
Pizza.description: Baked fresh to order in a pan, amazingly soft, crunchy, buttery and extra cheesy, each bite of Pan Pizza promises to tantalize your taste buds.

Sushi.name: Chirashizushi
Sushi.description: Chirashizushi  serves the rice in a bowl and tops it with a variety of raw fish and vegetable garnishes.

Sushi.name: Inarizushi
Sushi.description: Inarizushi is a pouch of fried tofu typically filled with sushi rice alone.

Sushi.name: Makizushi
Sushi.description: Makizushi is usually cut into six or eight pieces, which constitutes a single roll order.

Drinks.name: Coca Cola
Drinks.description: Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink manufactured by The Coca-Cola Company.

Drinks.name: Pepsi
Drinks.description: Pepsi is a carbonated soft drink manufactured by PepsiCo.

Drinks.name: Fanta
Drinks.description: Fanta is a brand of fruit-flavored carbonated soft drink.

Dessert.name: Cake
Dessert.description: Cake is a form of sweet food made from flour, sugar, and other ingredients, that is usually baked.

Dessert.name: Ice cream
Dessert.description: Ice cream is a sweetened frozen food typically eaten as a snack or dessert.

Dessert.name: Doughnut
Dessert.description: Doughnut is a type of fried dough confection or dessert food.
